name: Iron Cogwheel Sturdy
description:
A super short stealth parody game that is inspired by Metal Gear Solid, except the creator has never played a Metal Gear Solid game before (because Revengance does not count).

One day I was chilling with my friend who is a huge Metal Gear Solid fan. I had just started a course on game development so he joked about how I should make the next MGS game but legally distinct. "Iron Cogwheel Sturdy" became an inside joke of ours for a while but then it faded away... Until now. As a birthday gift I developed this parody game in secret and now it is available to the public!

The game also features some sick legally distinct tunes by Joakim "Klagarn" Jansson! You can check out the entire soundtrack here!
